item.title: MIUI OS3.0.3.0.WMLCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K60 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K60 Ultra China

Codename: corot

Version: OS3.0.3.0.WMLCNXM | 16.0

Size: 9.0 GB

MD5: 93ea84d35f0425a6eb2002af2d429d71

Changelog:
[Basic experience]
Smoother and more stable
Performance enhancements:
Optimization: Refined compiler instructions enhance performance and responsiveness while lowering power use.
Optimization: Improved memory allocation and recovery increases available system memory.
Optimization: Improved integrated frequency scheduling boosts system efficiency and reduces power consumption.
Optimization: Improved short-video playback efficiency for better battery life.

Optimized graphics:
A new window-rendering mechanism reduces graphics-rendering load.

Smoother system animations:
Optimization: Fine-tuned animations across 100+ system scenes for smoother, more natural motion.
[Xiaomi HyperIsland]
Everything you need to keep an eye on. In one place.
A new format that combines Notification spotlight and device notifications makes any important updates reach you faster.
New UI design lets you see all the details at a glance, with smoother switching between islands.
Now you can pull down to expand small windows and handle multiple tasks more efficiently.
Drag ride-hailing trips and other live updates straight into chats for quicker sharing.
[Revamped visuals]
Cleaner, more refined visuals throughout.
Redesigned Home screen icons now look sharper and more detailed.
The Home screen grid has been redesigned with more balanced margins and more comfortable spacing.
The status bar has a new, cleaner design that's more refined and easier to read.
A new design system improves color comfort, unifies rounded corners across the entire system, and makes controls easier to use for a more consistent look and feel.
A new large-clock Lock screen adds more depth and layers to the layout.
New AI-powered dynamic wallpapers turn static images into dynamic ones with a single tap.
A new all-in-one editor allows you to adjust both the Home screen and Lock screen wallpapers at the same time.
[Comprehensive system app optimization]
Interaction with apps has become more intuitive and direct.
Gallery:
New: New Gallery widgets allow you to select your preferred collections for display.
New: You can pin albums now to have quick access to your favorite photos anytime.
Optimization: Improved search for quicker, more accurate results for photos.

Weather:
Optimization: Improved content card blur effects for a smoother, more immersive scrolling experience.

Calendar:
New: Week view gives you a clear look at your weekly schedule.
New: You can check your daily horoscope easily now.
Optimization: Improved month-view visuals give you clearer highlights for holidays and important events.

Camera:
New: With new watermark styles, your photos can become even more fun and unique.

Recorder:
New: With technical term and dialect recognition, your transcriptions have become even more accurate.
New: Structured summaries let you review recorded content more efficiently.
Optimization: Accurate start page categories let you locate recordings faster with icons.
Optimization: Improved playback brings you smart noise reduction for clearer voices.

Other improvements:
New: Travel assistant now supports Railway 12306 with real-time trip reminders and ticket info for bookings made by others.
New: Copied text in certain scenarios now opens the related app directly.
New: Alarms can now be used with your work shift schedule.
New: Messaging now supports marking items as read in one tap.
Optimization: Improved Child mode with unified time tracking across devices, eye care features, and better protection tools.
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
Smoother. Effortless.
More convenient interface:
New: Now you can launch apps quickly by typing their initials.
Optimization: Improved wake-up animations and interface.

All-new Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi suggestions:
New: When you wake your assistant, scene-aware suggestions appear with one-tap access to relevant features, no typing needed.

Circle to select with Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi:
Circle to select items as soon as your voice assistant reacts. Now it understands on-screen content and can answer questions or perform actions. After circling, it can also share a screenshot.

Instant assistance:
New: Large-model–powered capabilities allow your assistant to handle on-screen tasks like a human, helping you quickly tackle everyday chores.

Translate images effortlessly:
You can translate the content captured by your camera or seen on your screen with continuous translation as you scroll.

DeepThink mode:
Get in-depth analysis of complex questions and generate structured research reports using multi-dimensional information.
[Interconnectivity]
Cross-ecosystem interconnectivity offers deep compatibility with the Apple ecosystem.
Touch to share:
Bring a Xiaomi phone or iPhone close to the NFC area to quickly share photos, dynamic shots, videos, files, browser pages, and contacts.

iPhone interconnectivity:
Two-way notification sync allows WeChat, QQ, SMS, and call alerts to be synchronized between Xiaomi phones and iPhones.
When connected to the same network, an iPhone can mirror and reply to WeChat and QQ messages from a Xiaomi phone.
When on the same network, an iPhone can share photos or files directly to WeChat or QQ on a Xiaomi phone.
View and use your Gallery synced to Xiaomi Cloud on an iPhone, connect to your Xiaomi phone via hotspot in one tap, and easily locate your devices.

iPad interconnectivity:
New: Home screen+ enables Xiaomi phones to mirror screen content to your iPad.
View and use your Gallery synced to Xiaomi Cloud on an iPad, connect to your Xiaomi phone via hotspot in one tap, and easily locate your devices.

Mac interconnectivity:
You can connect to your Xiaomi phone via hotspot in one tap and view its location on a Mac.
Now you can open multiple phone apps simultaneously and adjust their window sizes.

Cross-device unlocking:
Use the fingerprint or password on your Xiaomi tablet to unlock your Xiaomi phone.
Use face recognition on your Xiaomi EV to unlock your Xiaomi phone.
Unlock your Xiaomi phone quickly using Touch ID, Face ID, or password on an iPhone, iPad, or Mac.

Interconnectivity availability:
* Touch to share: Requires iPhone 12 or newer running iOS 17 or later.
* To use interconnectivity with Apple devices, update them to iOS 14, iPadOS 14, or macOS 12 or later.
* Apple devices must have the latest version of Xiaomi Interconnectivity installed.
* Cross-device unlocking: Xiaomi YU7 must be updated to Xiaomi HyperOS 1.10.0 or later; other models will be supported via future OTA updates.
[Privacy and security]
Enhanced protection keeps your data private and safe.
Private access lets apps access only the data you choose, giving you full control over your privacy.
* This feature requires developer support.
The system's privacy and password features have been redesigned with a cleaner, fresher interface.
Advanced data protection now uses post-quantum encryption to keep personal data even more secure.

Find device:
New Lost mode lets you locate your device once it's turned on.
Now you can locate your device even without an internet connection.
[Other]
Visit our website to learn more: https://hyperos.mi.com/

Download: Here

New: With technical term and dialect recognition, your transcriptions have become even more accurate.

Optimization: Accurate start page categories let you locate recordings faster with icons.

New: Travel assistant now supports Railway 12306 with real-time trip reminders and ticket info for bookings made by others.
New: Copied text in certain scenarios now opens the related app directly.

New: Now you can launch apps quickly by typing their initials.
Optimization: Improved wake-up animations and interface.

New: When you wake your assistant, scene-aware suggestions appear with one-tap access to relevant features, no typing needed.

New: Large-model–powered capabilities allow your assistant to handle on-screen tasks like a human, helping you quickly tackle everyday chores.

You can translate the content captured by your camera or seen on your screen with continuous translation as you scroll.

DeepThink mode:
Get in-depth analysis of complex questions and generate structured research reports using multi-dimensional information.

Cross-ecosystem interconnectivity offers deep compatibility with the Apple ecosystem.

Bring a Xiaomi phone or iPhone close to the NFC area to quickly share photos, dynamic shots, videos, files, browser pages, and contacts.

Two-way notification sync allows WeChat, QQ, SMS, and call alerts to be synchronized between Xiaomi phones and iPhones.

iPad interconnectivity:
New: Home screen+ enables Xiaomi phones to mirror screen content to your iPad.

Mac interconnectivity:
You can connect to your Xiaomi phone via hotspot in one tap and view its location on a Mac.
Now you can open multiple phone apps simultaneously and adjust their window sizes.

Use the fingerprint or password on your Xiaomi tablet to unlock your Xiaomi phone.
Use face recognition on your Xiaomi EV to unlock your Xiaomi phone.

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.17.0.UMLCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K60 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K60 Ultra China

Codename: corot

Version: OS1.0.17.0.UMLCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: df5b9ad2c6572a21f4ac9858385e9ea2

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Optimization: Improved system resource recovery strategy when switching apps to enhance app smoothness
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Fix: Having too many notifications could cause the system to restart

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.1.5.0.VMLEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T Pro EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Pro EEA

Codename: corot

Version: OS1.1.5.0.VMLEUXM | 15.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 03d35d5f9509109d58a66caf27aa4e03

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
Optimization: Folder icons weren't always fully displayed
Optimization: An issue when a lot of space in the upper part of the screen was left blank in the Home screen layout
Optimization: App drawer layout
Fix: Home screen stopped working in some cases
[Recents]
Fix: App card started shaking when card order was rearranged
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Fix: Screenshots turned out black for some apps

Download: Here
